t: CAVAYOMA 100% Baby Alpaca Yarn Chunky in 30+ Colors (itch-free) #5 Bulky Baby Alpaca Yarn for Knitting & Crocheting Set of 6 Skeins (300g, 10,5oz) Hand selected Quality from Peru - Hunter Green : Amazon.ca: Home
s: In general, alpaca wool is considered to be a very high quality, perhaps even higher than merino or mohair. This particular brand is super soft and silky. The variety of colors is amazing and the overall quality is definitely superior. I have started knitting a sweater on my knitting machine.
